english: (+ dat.) I believe (in), trust, have faith in
(+gen.) in front of, in the presence of
(+acc.) onto; (+gen.) on, in the time of; (+dat.) on, in, on the basis of
(+acc.) under; (+gen.) by, at the hands of
I drive out, cast out, throw out
I speak well of, bless, praise
(+dat.) I take heed of, pay attention to
I come to, go to, approach
that, because, or, (marking beginning of speech)
